name: The Capybarrier
description:
You are a capybara. Your freedom lies on the other side of your greatest obstacle. Despite your past efforts, you can not defeat the wall on your own. You must rally your zoomates to surpass The Capybarrier.

Controls:

  • Move - WASD / Arrow Keys
  • Interact - Click
  • Pause - E

Features:

  • Multiple Endings  Coming Soon!
  • Impactful Choices Coming Soon!
  • Hand Drawn Pixel Art
  • Several Adorable Animals
  • Completely Original Soundtrack
  • Secrets!

Credits:

  • Lawlalotti - Grand Architect
  • Rainloaf - Capybara Grandmaster
  • peachygeck - Supreme Zoo Mage
  • mgyorki1 - Animal Overlord
  • Fracta Mundi - Kiwi Lord

Recommended Specs:

  • Any Browser (Except Internet Explorer)
  • Windows 10

(Add Capybaras to your own game!)
